opCodes.description: (One Word Parameter)
Flash the screen white quickly
(Two Byte Parameters)
(Two Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
(No Parameters) Loads Point from memory at 0xBF2158
Sets Unknown2 to 0
Sets Unknown2 to 1
Sets Unknown1 to 1
(One Byte Parameter) Sets active Idle camera index (based on formation data) to parameter
(One Byte Parameter) If non-0 parameter, set 0xBF2A34 to 3
(No Parameter) Sets 0xBF2A34 to Fh; No questions asked
(Two Byte Parameters)
(No Parameters) Loads current idle camera position point
Tweens the camera from the current position to the idle position
(Two Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
Tweens the camera from the current position to the given xyz position
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters)
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters)
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters)
(Two Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters)
(Two Byte, Three Word Parameters)
(One Byte, Three Word Parameters)
Sets Unknown1 to 0
(One Byte, Two Word Parameters)
(One Byte, Two Word Parameters)
Execute wait
Sets the wait in frames
(Six Word Parameters) Store These values in six words starting at 0xBFCE0C (not in order)
(One Byte, Three Word Parameters)
Sets the active camera position XYZ
(One Optional Parameter) If waiting and next byte is C0h, then restart script and stop waiting. Else do nothing?
Return - Script End
Should be return but empty in 2 scripts
(Two Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
(No Parameters) Loads point from memory at 0xBFB1A0
Sets Unknown1 to 0
Sets Unknown1 to 1
(One Byte Parameter) Sets Current active Idle Camera (indexed in formation data) to parameter
(One Byte Parameter) If non-0 parameter, set 0xBF2A34 to 3
(No Parameter) Sets 0xBF2A34 to Fh; No questions asked
(Two byte parameters)
(No Parameters) Loads point of current active Idle camera
Tweens the camera from the current position to the idle position
(Two Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters) *
Tweens the camera from the current position to the given xyz position
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters)
(One Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters)
(Two Byte, Three Word, One Byte Parameters)
(Two Byte, Three Word Parameters)
Execute wait
Sets the wait in frames
(One Byte, Three Word Parameters)
(One Byte, Three Word Parameters)
Sets the active camera position XYZ
(One Optional Parameter) If waiting and next byte is C0h, then restart script and stop waiting. Else do nothing?
Return - Script End
